testcase.classname: SC1- Registration | guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.name: User will enter valid to inputs
testcase.system-out: Given User should have an email to register.................................passed And User navigate to register page..........................................passed When User enter valid data..................................................passed Then User could be register successfully....................................passed

testcase.classname: SC2- User could log in with valid email and password
testcase.name: User log in with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given User navigate to login page...........................................passed When User enter valid email.................................................passed And User enter valid password...............................................passed And User Click to login button..............................................passed Then User could be logged in successfully...................................passed

testcase.classname: SC3- User could reset his/her password successfully
testcase.name: User want to reset his/her password
testcase.system-out: Given User navigate to login page directly..................................passed When User enter the reset password button...................................passed And User enter his email to send the key to reset the password..............passed And User clicked to reset button............................................passed Then The website send to email hsa been register............................passed

testcase.classname: SC4- Logged User could search for any product
testcase.name: User search about product
testcase.system-out: Given User should to be logged in successfully..............................passed When User Write the name of product an Ex:"Camera"..........................passed And User clicked to enter button in keyboard................................passed Then The wabsite should appear the results related to the product name......passed

testcase.classname: SC5- Logged User could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.name: Logged user switch currency to euro
testcase.system-out: Given User should to be logged in successfully..............................passed When User choose "Euro" as a main currency from static dropdown.............passed Then The currency in the website should to be changed.......................passed

testcase.classname: SC6- Logged user could select different Categories
testcase.name: Logged user select Category
testcase.system-out: Given User should to be logged in successfully..............................passed When User select any category...............................................passed Then The website should to appear the products that related to the category selected.passed

testcase.classname: SC7- Logged user could filter with color
testcase.name: User filter selected item with color
testcase.system-out: Given User should to be logged in successfully..............................passed And User should to select an item to filter.................................passed When User filter items by color option......................................passed Then User appear for him the filter items with color he choosed.............passed

testcase.classname: SC8- Logged user could select different tags
testcase.name: User try to select different tags
testcase.system-out: Given User should to be logged in successfully..............................passed And User select any category................................................passed When User select different tags.............................................passed Then User appear for him results of related items for this tag..............passed

testcase.classname: SC9- Logged user could add different products to Shopping cart
testcase.name: User try to add product to shopping cart
testcase.system-out: Given User should to be logged in successfully..............................passed And User go to home page to shop any product................................passed When User add products to cart..............................................passed Then User should to find the products in shopping cart......................passed

testcase.classname: SC10- Logged user could add different products to Wishlist
testcase.name: User could be able to add products to wishlist
testcase.system-out: Given User logged in successfully...........................................passed And User go to home page to shop any product................................passed When User select different products to wishlist.............................passed Then User show green message for successful add products to wishlist........passed And User open wishlist page and find the items has been selected............passed

testcase.classname: SC11- Logged user could add different products to compare list
testcase.name: user try to compare multiple products
testcase.system-out: Given User logged in successfully...........................................passed And User go to home page to shop any product................................passed When User try to compare multiple products..................................passed Then Successful message for add products to compare list....................passed And Products should to be find into compare list page.......................passed

testcase.name: User make an order
testcase.system-out: Given User logged in successfully...........................................passed When User add products to cart..............................................passed And User fill her data for make the order...................................passed Then Order should created successfully......................................passed

testcase.name: User opens facebook link
testcase.system-out: Given User go to home page..................................................passed When User opens facebook link...............................................passed Then "https://www.facebook.com/nopCommerce" facebook page is opened.........passed
